ComicInfo.Title: Bad Batch, Right Stuff
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped behind enemy lines! Surrounded on all sides by deadly battle droids! All in a day's work for the Bad Batch!
While investigating reports of strange modified battle droids, the squad finds themselves at the mercy of a sinister Separatist scientist, who plans on using the team as a part of his twisted experiments. Caught in a lethal game of cat and mouse, this mission may prove too dangerous even for the Bad Batch! Mad science and mayhem abound!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 00:22:48. [CVDB1028101]
